index@main_banner_title: I finally understand that The Open Network
index@main_banner_description: A decentralized and open internet, created by the community using a technology designed by Telegram.
index@main_wallets_title: Get your wallet to join TON
index@main_wallets_mobile_title:
Get your wallet
to join TON
index@main_wallets_card_description_0: Secure your crypto, NFTs, and easily access TON apps using Tonkeeper.
index@main_wallets_card_description_1: Send and receive crypto from any Telegram user in just a few taps with @wallet.
index@main_toncoin_info_description: Toncoin is TON's native cryptocurrency. It is used for network operations, transactions, games or collectibles built on TON.
index@description_0: Use Toncoin for contribution to network security.
index@description_2: Transfer your tokens from Ethereum to TON.
index@main_apps_card_description_0: Affordable and secure mobile internet provider for home and travel.
index@main_apps_card_description_1: Your wallet or website can be easily found in the TON network.
index@main_apps_card_description_2: A fast, secure, and affordable way to protect your internet freedom.
index@main_apps_card_3_description: Use your crypto wallet to pay for subscriptions for yourself and friends.
index@main_apps_card_4_description: Explore, buy, and sell collectibles used in games and services.
index@main_apps_card_5_title: Explore hundreds more apps and services
index@main_blockchain_card_description_0: Ultra-scalable, designed by Telegram to onboard billions of users.
index@main_blockchain_card_description_1: TON is a Proof-of-Stake network maintained by independent validators.
index@main_blockchain_card_description_2: The average transaction cost is just a few cents.
index@main_blockchain_card_3_description: TON is audited by global security firms including [CertiK](https://www.certik.com/projects/the-open-network), [Chainsulting](https://github.com/chainsulting/Smart-Contract-Security-Audits/tree/master/TON) and [SlowMist](https://github.com/slowmist/Knowledge-Base/raw/master/open-report-V2/blockchain/SlowMist%20Audit%20Report%20-%20TON_en-us.pdf).
index@main_blockchain_card_4_description: Transactions are confirmed in a matter of seconds.
index@join_community_subtitle: Ask questions, share ideas and participate in breakfasts, hubs, local events with people who love TON.
index@community_card_0_subtitle: Organise breakfasts, hubs, informal meetings with like-minded people and share ideas.
index@community_card_1_subtitle: Fast-track for crypto enthusiasts and Web3 wizards looking to grow the TON community.
